pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 1, 2016:

Vancouver

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will speak at the Smart Prosperity Kick Off. A media availability will follow.

Telus Garden
23rd floor
510 W Georgia Street
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.

Surrey

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Surrey Mayor Linda Hepner.

Surrey City Hall
6th Floor
13450 104 Avenue
Surrey, BC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
